review.title: “Pretty good.”
review.pros: Pros – The work life balance is great. They are very understanding about school, traffic, problems, or just a need to run an important errand. The environment is very relaxed.
review.cons: Cons – I've never worked for any contractor that can control the client. They all seem to cave which results in periods of more stress or work that isn't to the level you want. But these are less frequent than the periods where the client is behind and time is ample.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Control the client and ask employees how much time is needed for a task before assigning it so it can be efficient.
